rules_text:
Galix enters with four counters of your choice from among flying, lifelink, deathtouch, and +1/+1. You may choose the same kind of counter multiple times.
Retrofit {1}{B} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It's a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
You may retrofit Galix from your graveyard by sacrificing four artifacts and/or creatures you control in addition to paying its retrofit cost.
